titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow Indian tribes to receive charitable contributions of apparently wholesome food.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4612)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
4/17/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to qualify Indian tribes as eligible recipients of tax deductible contributions of food inventory (i.e., apparently wholesome food as defined by the Bill Emerson Good Samaritan Food Donation Act).
